tasks.task_description: Remove backend server files (backend-server.js, backend-package.json, Express routes)
Clean up backend dependencies from package.json (express, mongodb, cors, nodemon)
Remove MongoDB setup scripts (setup-mongodb-auth.js, test-mongodb-connection.js, start-local-mongodb.sh)
Clean up MongoDB dependencies and environment variables
Remove database-related scripts and utilities from scripts directory
Update documentation to remove backend setup instructions
Clean up CI/CD configurations and Docker files
Verify React Native app builds and functions correctly
Final verification and testing of cleaned project

description: Execute backend cleanup tasks from .kiro/specs/08-backend-cleanup/tasks.md - remove backend API server, MongoDB infrastructure, and clean up project structure
